programme.title: Separated by Language
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke muses on curious linguistic differences between America and England.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke was unable to give his talk. In this repeat, from October 1998, Alistair Cooke muses on curious linguistic differences between America and England.
